title: IMF to continue technical talks until new govt. is formed
body_lines: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) yesterday said it would continue technical-level discussions with Sri Lanka to be prepared for policy discussions when a new government is formed.

“On our virtual mission during May 09-23, discussions at technical level have just started and continue as planned, so as to be fully prepared for policy discussions once a new government has been formed,” a brief IMF statement said.
It also said the IMF is closely following the developments in Sri Lanka and is concerned about social tensions and violence.
“We remain committed to assist Sri Lanka in line with the IMF’s policies,” the statement added.
